title: Jenna Fischer Weighs In on Chrissy Teigen’s Jim and Pam Twitter Poll
text:
Chrissy Teigen celebrated the 10th anniversary of Jim and Pam’s wedding on The Office by theorizing that they are probably divorced today. While it’s true that some couples break up even after 10 years of seemingly wedded bliss, Office stans of the Internet flipped out Teigen’s harsh prediction. One such outraged superfan was Pam herself, Jenna Fischer. Fischer joined Angela Kinsey on WHHL to play a game of Where Are They Now with all your favorite Scrantonites. According to Fischer and Kinsey Jim and Pam are still together, Phyllis had Bob Vance killed for the insurance money, and Ryan and Kelly are still on-again-off-again. Oh, and Stanley has new families across the country.

Actually you know what? Phyllis and Bob are def still together. Dwight and Angela still together. Michael and Holly definitely together. Mathematically (i got a C+) SOMEONE here has to be divorced. It’s Jim and Pam. — christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) October 14, 2019
description: Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey were on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen to speak on what the Office characters would be doing now. Holly and Michael are still together, not in Scranton. Angela and Dwight have many children. And Bob Vance died
